title: Kosovo confirms first coronavirus cases, an Italian and a Kosovar
description: Kosovo reported its first coronavirus cases on Friday, in a 20-year-old Italian woman and a 77-year-old Kosovar man.
content:

author: Colin Dwyer
title: Kosovo Is In Turmoil After Coronavirus Controversy Helped Fell Its Government
description: Prime Minister Albin Kurti lost a no-confidence vote initiated by members of his own coalition Wednesday night. Now, the Balkan country is feeling for a way forward amid a global pandemic.
content:
Kosovo's prime minister, Albin Kurti, seen earlier this month in Pristina, saw his government lose power on a no-confidence vote Wednesday. But he and his ministers are likely to stay in office for a while yet, as the coronavirus crisis unfolds.
